name: Apart
description:
"Apart” is a two-player, split-screen adventure game in which the players use a shared keyboard or a single shared XBox controller to find each other in the maze-like, war-torn town. Innovative game elements assist them in their journey. As the players approach near each other, the ambient music increases in complexity, layering in more instruments as an audio cue for the general direction of the other player. The colors in the environment become more saturated and vibrant the closer the players are to each other. 

Show the world that love conquers all. Survive the dangerous obstacles and armed soldiers to reunite with your loved one so you will never be “Apart”.

Janet Hwang - Art
